title: NFL Week 15 Fantasy Football Advice (Football 12/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Heath Cummings to break down Week 15 from a fantasy perspective. The guys preview Thursday Night Football's matchup between the Chiefs and Chargers (2:00), then take a look at Carson Wentz' injury (13:45) before debating which quarterbacks they want to play in Week 15 (18:15), discussing which wide receivers are sleeper options (29:00), if David Johnson can have a breakout game (32:00), why Doug Martin is a great start (34:30), which DST units are the most helpful for the playoffs (37:30) and then take listener tweets (40:00) before discussing some beer talk.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
